description: |First digit - second digit + third digit - fourth digit ...| = 6.
mathematica: Do[ a = IntegerDigits[ n ]; l = Length[ a ]; e = o = {}; Do[ o = Append[ o, a[[ 2k - 1 ] ] ], {k, 1, l/2 + .5} ]; Do[ e = Append[ e, a[[ 2k ] ] ], {k, 1, l/2} ]; If[ Abs[ Apply[ Plus, o ] - Apply[ Plus, e ] ] == 6, Print[ n ] ], {n, 1, 1000} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 10 2001
